title: Cognitive Engineering-Based Simultaneous Interpretation Training Microlearning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic foreign language listening/speaking skills and experience with simple translations
context.additional_context: A short-term intensive language program for teenagers in a BYOD environment, applying a project-based assessment system.

learning_goals: Learners can provide simultaneous interpretation of 3-minute spoken audio materials within 1 minute.
Learners improve information processing efficiency by 30% by integrating multiple sensory channels (auditory/visual/textual).
Learners expand working memory capacity by 20% using cognitive load management strategies during interpretation.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
